description:
We have some migrations that don't contain a downgrade operation. 

This makes testing branches in dev difficult because we either have to manually rollback the changes or (tediously) recreate the database anew.

http://paste.openstack.org/show/3330/


Somewhat related to 854905.
title: Migrations without a downgrade

comments.content:
We have some migrations that don't contain a downgrade operation. 

This makes testing branches in dev difficult because we either have to manually rollback the changes or (tediously) recreate the database anew.

http://paste.openstack.org/show/3330/


Somewhat related to 854905.
